评论概述: These Bibs are Great.....Now read this for sizing!!!
评论详情: The product is very nice and you will be happy with the quality.  But it would help if you heeded what everyone is telling you about size.  I am 5'5".  I wear slacks and jeans with a 33 waist and a 29" or 30" inseam.I ordered a 36 waist and a 28" inseam for these overalls.  The waist fits but is a bit tight.  The inseam is long but acceptable.  The legs don't drag on the floor but it's very close.  I don't know who measures these bibs but he or she needs a new pair of glasses.  I am happy with my Bibs though.  You will be too if you order accordingly.  Enjoy!!

评论详情: These denim overalls by HISEA are not sized similarly to Carhardt or Dickies Brands.  These overalls have a much longer torso and the inseam and waist measurements seem to be extremely generous as well.  My husband wears Carhardt overalls daily and I was trying to find a more economical solution for his wardrobe choice, but these are not a good solution for his body type.  However! If you have a longer torso and longer legs, these could be the brand for you!  The quality of the fabric, hardware and the workmanship were very good.

评论概述: Very sturdy and well designed for utility
评论详情: These are really strong. I'm not in construction, just wanted something that doesn't require a belt; something like this instead of suspenders. I ordered extra wide waste because I might be wearing over something else sometimes, and for around home I don't need a perfect fit.But the thing is made for someone quite a bit taller than my 6 foot.  And.... I don't know if there is a way to design the suspenders to hold a shortening adjustment, but it was hard to adjust them and get them to hold the shorter suspender length.. Don't want to do it by sewing.... Seem to be holding now, after a couple washings, but.... Suggestion?

I originally purchased brown duck bib overalls. They were damaged.  Also, I did not like the extra heavy material. Some may like thick , heavy fabric, depending on what work or climate you will be wearing them, I prefer lightweight, durable material that I can move freely as I go about my chores in the yard and shed.  I received a refund , and a second pair , no charge!!! Absolute top notch customer service!  The replacement pair are dark indigo. After first wash , I am completely pleased with the quality and fit, and price is comparable, if not better than leading brands  The shoulder straps didn’t shrivel up, and remained flat…now if I could get bacon to do same. The denim is thick, but not terribly heavy, I could imagine wearing these for 10 years.

The original review I posted is below. I returned the first pair I ordered for a replacement pair. The delivery was quick and contained a pair that fit perfect! The tags were attached and everything was in order. These Overalls are made of strong material and are very durable. The company gave me a quick refund for the first pair. I will be back to buy more and will probably be buying some of their other products as well.  Original 2-star review: Length and waist were perfect. Chest and back were tight! After inspectiont these look like they were someone else's return. Labels are attached to snaps. I'm not sure they are supposed to be that way. I also found a stain/ spot on the leg of the overalls. I'm returning for a slightly bigger size. I sure hope the new pair is actually new!
